channel.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sean "Diddy" Combs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ Attorneys File Motion for His Release From Brooklyn Lockup
item.description: His team wrote that “there has literally never been a case like this one,” as Combs remains jailed until his Oct. 3 sentencing hearing.
